SEARCH
Package librarySE.core

Interface LibraryItem

All Superinterfaces:
Borrowable, Searchable, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractLibraryItem, Book, CD, Journal
public interface LibraryItem extends Borrowable, Searchable, Serializable
Represents a general library item that can be borrowed and searched.

This interface combines the behavior of Borrowable and Searchable, and adds core identifying and descriptive attributes common to all library materials, such as books, CDs, or journals.

Every LibraryItem should have:

  • A unique UUID identifier
  • A descriptive title
  • A MaterialType that specifies its category (BOOK, CD, JOURNAL, etc.)
  • A price that represents the itemâ€™s value or replacement cost

Author:
Eman

  • Method Details

    • getId

      UUID getId()
      Returns the unique identifier of this library item.
      Returns:
      a non-null UUID representing the unique ID of this item

    • getTitle

      String getTitle()
      Returns the title of this library item.
      Returns:
      the title of the item; never null or empty

    • getMaterialType

      MaterialType getMaterialType()
      Returns the material type of this item (e.g., BOOK, CD, JOURNAL).
      Returns:
      the MaterialType representing the item's category

    • getPrice

      BigDecimal getPrice()
      Returns the price of this item.

      The price may represent the cost of replacement, market value, or reference price for fines and fees.

      Returns:
      the item's price as a double

    • setPrice

      void setPrice(BigDecimal price)
      Sets the price of this item.
      Parameters:
      price - the new price to assign; must be non-negative
